page.title: 03Pine Tree Farm
page.content: Pine Tree Farm,on the outskirts of Wookey,is owned by Mr. Ralph Stott.The farm is a dairy farm with 53 Friesian cows.Mr. Stott does not need to employ outside labour on the farm. This farm was once part of a much larger unit which was broken up on the death of the old owner. The present farmhouse,a bungalow,was completed eight years ago. The farm buildings consist of 4 barns,5 sheds,2 cubicle houses,2 chicken houses and a milking parlour.There is also a silage pit and a dung ramp. The farm machinery consists of 4 tractors(one of them a 1946 David Brown with 2 seats) 2 trailers,a turner,a yardscraper,a silager,a dung spreader,a fertilizer,a P.Z.mower and a pair of chain harrows.
